content: *skulls - not only for halloween this pattern contains **4 variations** of skull designs * *the pillow/tapestry is made using **overlay mosaic crochet** for the front panel it is quite easy but very effective technique using only single_crochet and double_crochet alternating colours each row the pattern contains 4 digital charts **full written instructions** for each chart mosaic crochet explanation advice on how to read the chart photos written pattern for a pillow back panels assembly instructions tapestry instructions and advice on how to make a blanket * *each digital chart is 75 stitches by 75 row = 40 x 40 cm * *each chart can be used to make the pillow wall hanging a bag blanket anything you like…your creativity has no boundaries and i would love to see what you make * *you will need two contrasting colours to make this pattern i have used **dk / 8 ply yarn ** for a pillow 160g of black yarn 60g of white yarn 100g = approx 280m* *this pattern has been designed by me sarka baran - sharka s magic crochet and is protected by international copyright law please do not copy share display or redistribute this pattern without the owner s permission this includes sharing photos of parts of the charts with others * *thank you to all my testers for they lovely work and contributions * *you are more than welcome to sell your finished items using this pattern/charts but i would appreciate if you could give me credit for the pattern if possible if you would like to contact me you can message me through ravelry or facebook *
